name: Death Chamber
description:
This is a game about survival. Avoid red objects that appear on screen. Collect green squares to increase your score. 

Reach 1000 points to unlock advanced abilities.

Music: Octoweaponry from the Splatoon OST

This build is what's left of a cancelled project.  It was an over-ambitious 10 month project that I restarted 5 times throughout.  Development progressed considerably past this point, but this build is the most functioning and the closest I got to the game's original vision.
